title: Intermittent test: PingIntegrationTest
body:
### Description
From https://app.circleci.com/pipelines/github/ConsenSys/teku/10329/workflows/df4958b5-6097-486a-bcee-0ba0ad6018ec/jobs/65226:

```
org.awaitility.core.ConditionTimeoutException: Assertion condition defined as a lambda expression in tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.async.Waiter that uses tech.pegasys.teku.infrastructure.async.Waiter$Condition 
Expecting:
  <Optional[Bitvector{data={}, size=64}]>
to contain:
  <Bitvector{data={0, 1, 8}, size=64}>
but did not within 30 seconds.
```

added debug, can re-open if we see this problem again.
